page.title: 11A Pensioner's Day
page.content: I arose at 8.0 a.m,had breakfast,did necessary household tasks in the flat, then I got ready to go out. A friend called to take me by car to a meeting of the W.I. Market Committee. This was timed to start at 9.30.a.m. and, as Chairman,I aimed for it to finish by 12 noon.I got home at about 12.30 for a quick lunch which had been prepared beforehand. Out again by 1.30 to get the coach for an afternoon's mystery tour.It was a lovely May afternoon and we went around the New Forest,stopping at Lyndhurst for afternoon tea. Back in the coach again,we called at the Sir Winston Churchill hostelry for a drink before going on to Wareham to get some fish and chips. Home by 9.0.p.m. Watched television,made supper and then ..so to bed.
